name: Movi
tagline: Movi is on a mission to lead the financial services industry and shape a culture of financial literacy in Vietnam.
description: Movi is on a mission to lead the financial services industry and shape a culture of financial literacy in Vietnam. We aim to make available financial services by enabling our customers to achieve their dreams in a financially responsible manner. We want to achieve national financial inclusion for all workers in Vietnam by delivering financial services with excellence, innovation and integrity.
